医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超重和肥胖与年轻人肠癌死亡率上升有关超重和肥胖导致欧盟 (EU) 和英国 25-49 岁人群肠癌死亡率上升，尽管整个欧洲此类癌症的死亡率总体呈下降趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Overweight-and-obesity-linked-to-rising-death-rates-from-bowel-cancer-among-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Overweight-and-obesity-linked-to-rising-death-rates-from-bowel-cancer-among-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45b64bea-d469-4836-a4e2-27e11676cb7b Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:23:49 -0500 Overweight and obesity linked to rising death rates from bowel cancer among young adults
医院规模不是影响小儿心脏手术结果的唯一因素对美国各地儿科心脏手术中心的一项研究表明，就成功的手术而言，决定质量结果的不仅仅是项目的规模。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Hospital-size-not-the-only-factor-in-pediatric-heart-surgery-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Hospital-size-not-the-only-factor-in-pediatric-heart-surgery-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb94a3c0-9758-4345-bbdb-064bd88d8f18 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:18:27 -0500 Hospital size not the only factor in pediatric heart surgery outcomes
尽管手术的长期生存率更高，但许多年轻患者仍选择 TAVR尽管国家指南建议对 65 岁以下患有严重主动脉瓣狭窄的患者进行外科主动脉瓣置换术 (SAVR)，但许多医院仍然选择对 60 岁以下的患者采用非手术方法，生存率可能较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Many-young-病人-选择-TAVR-尽管-better-long-term-survival-with-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Many-young-病人-选择-TAVR-尽管-better-long-term-survival-with-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e895ca0b-6a7a-4a1e-824c-e47d6a5fb38c Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:12:57 -0500 Many young patients choose TAVR despite better long-term survival with surgery
国际湿疹理事会调查气候变化如何影响湿疹研究人员总结了有关与温室气体排放相关的气候危害及其对特应性皮炎（AD）影响的文献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/The-International-Eczema-Council-investigate-how-climate-change-may-impact-eczema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/The-International-Eczema-Council-investigate-how-climate-change-may-impact-eczema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fe1aa40-d6ed-490e-9d09-5d9c1b1f07ff Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:12:00 -0500 The International Eczema Council investigate how climate change may impact eczema

研究发现，在 NHS 筛查之外诊断出患有 DCIS 的女性乳腺癌死亡率将增加四倍研究人员将公众筛查期间未发现的导管原位癌 (DCIS) 与通过 NHS 乳腺筛查计划发现的侵袭性乳腺癌和死亡率风险进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Study-finds-women-with-DCIS-diagnosed-outside-NHS-screening-face-fourfold-increase-in-breast-cancer-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Study-finds-women-with-DCIS-diagnosed-outside-NHS-screening-face-fourfold-increase-in-breast-cancer-mortality.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6616d259-1177-47e2-8d68-f0eb332b869d Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:45:00 -0500 Study finds women with DCIS diagnosed outside NHS screening face fourfold increase in breast cancer mortality
记录显示，尽管成瘾危机促使其他连锁店撤退，但 Publix 阿片类药物的销量仍在增长2015 年 10 月，Teva Pharmaceuticals 的一名高管在发现 Publix Super Markets 杂货连锁店强效阿片类药物的订单存在“严重危险信号”后，于 2015 年 10 月对这家超市进行了举报。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Records-show-Publix-opioid-sales-grew-even-as-addiction-crisis-prompted-other-chainse28099-pullback.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Records-show-Publix-opioid-sales-grew-even-as-addiction-crisis-prompted-other-chainse28099-pullback.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9989bb59-19ca-4a7a-8acc-ffd46267994d Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:08:59 -0500 Records show Publix opioid sales grew even as addiction crisis prompted other chains’ pullback
